name: Flying Nimbus [Christmas]
skill: Restores 3006/3686 HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP. Target deals 45%/55% more DMG for a limited time.
ability: Skill attacks sharply increase target's ATK speed.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a magic flying cloud. She loves people with inner beauty, strength, and pure dreams, and forms partnerships with them. She even once formed partnership with Santa Claus himself. During the Christmas season, she helps deliver presents to children, partially in an effort to promote herself. This has led some children to be under the mistaken impression that Santa Claus rides around on a cloud.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 14/12/16 - 04/01/2017
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 01/01/2017 - 04/01/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the drop rate of Tiny Present by 25% during the "Shadow over Christmas" event.
◦ Summon rate increased until 14/12/16 - 04/01/2017

limit_break: "This is all thanks to my Christmas publicity stunts!"
